meaningMnemonic: The thing you <kanji>extract</kanji> from a <kanji>phenomenon</kanji> is an <vocabulary>abstraction</vocabulary>. Extracting abstraction out of a phenomenon may not sound like a very concrete or vivid mnemonic, but I guess that makes it an appropriate abstraction…
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
